title: Motorway delays after crash
text:
One lane of the westbound M27 was blocked at junction seven following a crash, shortly before 8.30am. 
Police were on the scene to divery traffic past the crash site. Share article 
The incident added to delays, with traffic already slow because of the wet conditions. 
The road was back to normal by 10am. Promoted Stories   one in a million 9:14am Tue 22 Sep 15 
Any day, another crash causing absolute gridlock on our woefully inadequate motorway system. Can the DE do some journalism and perhaps run an article on what those in power are doing to ease these problems?? Preferably before too many of us are maimed or killed?
